verses.verse: Let <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to the <S%G5242>higher<s%> <S%G1849>powers.<s%> For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> but of <S%G2316>God:<s%> the <S%G1849>powers<s%> that be are <S%G5021>ordained<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3588>Whoever<s%> <S%G5620>therefore<s%> <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G1849>power,<s%> <S%G436>resists<s%> the <S%G1296>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> and they that <S%G436>resist<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2917>damnation.<s%>

For <S%G758>rulers<s%> are not a <S%G5401>terror<s%> to <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> but to the <S%G2556>evil.<s%> <S%G2309>Will<s%> you <S%G1161>then<s%> not be <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the <S%G1849>power?<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G18>good,<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> of the <S%G846>same:<s%>

For he is the <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to you for <S%G18>good.<s%> But <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2556>evil,<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid;<s%> for he <S%G5409>bears<s%> not the <S%G3162>sword<s%> in <S%G1500>vain:<s%> for he is the <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G1558>revenger<s%> to execute <S%G3709>wrath<s%> on him that <S%G4238>does<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> you must <S%G318>needs<s%> be <S%G5293>subject,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> for <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> for <S%G4893>conscience<s%> sake.

For for <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G5055>pay<s%> you <S%G5411>tribute<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> for they are <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G3011>ministers,<s%> <S%G4342>attending<s%> <S%G4342>continually<s%> on <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> thing.

<S%G591>Render<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G3782>dues:<s%> <S%G5411>tribute<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5411>tribute<s%> is <S%G514>due;<s%> <S%G5056>custom<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5056>custom;<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5401>fear;<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5092>honor.<s%>

<S%G3784>Owe<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3367>any<s%> thing, but to <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another:<s%> for he that <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> has <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

For <S%G3588>this,<s%> You shall not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> You shall not <S%G5407>kill,<s%> You shall not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> You shall not <S%G5576>bear<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>witness,<s%> You shall not <S%G1937>covet;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> it is <S%G346>briefly<s%> <S%G346>comprehended<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G1722>namely,<s%> You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G1438>yourself.<s%>
<S%G26>Love<s%> <S%G2038>works<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2556>ill<s%> to his <S%G4139>neighbor:<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> is the <S%G4138>fulfilling<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

And that, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> that <S%G2236>now<s%> it is high <S%G5610>time<s%> to <S%G1453>awake<s%> out of <S%G5258>sleep:<s%> for <S%G3568>now<s%> is our <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1452>nearer<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

The <S%G3571>night<s%> is far <S%G4298>spent,<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> is <S%G1448>at<s%> <S%G1448>hand:<s%> let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G656>cast<s%> <S%G659>off<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> and let us <S%G1746>put<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>

Let us <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2156>honestly,<s%> as in the <S%G2250>day;<s%> not in <S%G2970>rioting<s%> and <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> not in <S%G2845>chambering<s%> and <S%G766>wantonness,<s%> not in <S%G2054>strife<s%> and <S%G2205>envying.<s%>

But <S%G1746>put<s%> you <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G4160>make<s%> not <S%G4307>provision<s%> for the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> to fulfill the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> thereof.
